title: Research & Development Excellence
description: At Refex Life Sciences, innovation is our engine of growth. With world-class R&D centres and a team of over 200 scientists, we are advancing the frontiers of both API development and complex finished dosage formulations (FDFs). Our research is focused on creating differentiated, sustainable, and patient‑centric solutions that address unmet needs across global healthcare.

points.title: Sustainable Process Development
points.description: Cost-effective, eco-friendly synthesis strategies for scalability and compliance.

points.title: Chiral Chemistry Expertise
points.description: Development of scalable chiral processes using advanced resolution and enzymatic techniques.

points.title: Complex Chemistry Capabilities
points.description: Proven expertise in Grignard reactions, N- & O-alkylations, borohydride reductions, and other specialized chemistries.

points.title: Impurity & Genotoxic Control
points.description: In-house synthesis, profiling, and validated risk management strategies ensuring global compliance.

points.title: Technology Transfer
points.description: Dedicated technical services team supporting seamless process scale‑up, HAZOP studies, and safety assessments.

points.title: Green Chemistry Principles
points.description: Embedding sustainability into every stage of product and process development.

points.title: Regulatory Support
points.description: Full‑fledged analytical R&D enabling robust filings and global regulatory responses.

points.title: Cross‑Functional Expertise
points.description: Integrating analytical, engineering, clinical, QA, and regulatory capabilities to deliver holistic solutions.

points.title: Innovation in Dosage Forms
points.description: Focus on complex injectables, novel drug delivery systems, and differentiated generics.

points.title: Proven Track Record
points.description: Successfully taking highly complex products from concept to commercialization, ensuring speed, compliance, and scalability.

promise.title: Our R&D Promise
promise.description: Through a relentless focus on innovation, sustainability, and regulatory excellence, Refex Life Sciences is shaping the future of healthcare – from breakthrough APIs to complex formulations that improve patient outcomes worldwide
